analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#493-513):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#505-506)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#509-512)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#586-601) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#601)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#672-673)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#673)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#418-419)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'new_master' of UpgradeableToken.changeUpgradeMaster (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#560) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'new_master' of UpgradeableToken.setUpgradeMaster (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#561) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'token_contract' of LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#589-591) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'initial_supply' of CrowdsaleToken.CrowdsaleToken (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#693) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'token_decimals' of CrowdsaleToken.CrowdsaleToken (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#693-694) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'team_multisig' of CrowdsaleToken.CrowdsaleToken (/unique_chucks/34/0xf87f0d9153fea549c728ad61cb801595a68b73de.sol#694) is not in mixedCase
